results.content: Very good explanations here for basic Google Chrome Extension development.  Provides a sound foundation.  Maybe a little more time perhaps an additional example instead of showing all the CSS code.  Use the CSS code, just don't show us so much.
results.content_html: Very good explanations here for basic Google Chrome Extension development. Provides a sound foundation. Maybe a little more time perhaps an additional example instead of showing all the CSS code. Use the CSS code, just don't show us so much.

results.content: I have purchased two courses on google extensions and this one is by far the better. With intermediate knowledge of html/css and no knowledge of JS I have been able to follow the course very easily. The lecturer's approach is very clear and concise and he is extremely knowledgeable. Would 100% recommend for anyone starting to learn this craft!
